mapper.select:
select
, left(article_content, 200) as `article_content` from article_station order by `id` desc limit (#{pageNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} - 1) * #{pageSize, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize, jdbcType=INTEGER}
